StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetCanvassDataByCardId]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@CardId uniqueiden..er AS BEGIN
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
DECLARE @SchoolCode uniqueiden..er DECLARE @SchoolYear int
CREATE TABLE #RESULTS ( Date DATETIME ,ProspectId UNIQUEIDENTIFIER )
SELECT @SchoolCode = hs.rowguid, @SchoolYear = SCHOOL_YEAR FROM MCRISS.dbo.HIGH_SCHOOL_PROFILE hsp INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.HIGH_SCHOOL hs ON hs.SCHOOL_CODE = hsp.SCHOOL_CODE WHERE hsp.rowguid = @CardId
SELECT DISTINCT CAST(CONVERT(varchar(4), YEAR(e.startdate)) + '-' + CONVERT(varchar(2), MONTH(e.startdate)) + '-' + CONVERT(varchar(2), DAY(e.startdate)) AS date.me) AS Startdate INTO #Event FROM RSSOSS.USMC.Event e INNER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.EventSubject es ON es.subjec.d = @CardId AND e.id=es.even.d AND e.EventSourceId = 20
-- begin select from main import events SELECT UpdateDate, psh.ProspectId INTO #ImportEvent FROM PROSPECTING.USMC.ImportEvent AS ie INNER JOIN PROSPECTING.USMC.ImportPerson AS iper ON (iper.ImportEventId = ie.ImportEventId) INNER JOIN PROSPECTING.USMC.Person AS per ON per.PersonId = iper.PersonId INNER JOIN PROSPECTING.USMC.Prospect AS p ON p.PersonId = iper.PersonId INNER join PROSPECTING.USMC.ProspectStatusHistory psh ON p.prospec.d=psh.prospec.d AND psh.Disposi.onId IN (2, 3, 4) WHERE ie.SchoolId = @SchoolCode and ie.Gradua.onYear = @SchoolYear AND ie.ImportEventStatusTypeId = 3
INSERT INTO #ImportEvent SELECT MIN(pc.ProspectDate) as UpdateDate, p.ProspectId FROM PROSPECTING.USMC.ImportEvent AS ie INNER JOIN PROSPECTING.USMC.ImportPerson AS iper ON (iper.ImportEventId = ie.ImportEventId) INNER JOIN PROSPECTING.USMC.Person AS per ON per.PersonId = iper.PersonId INNER JOIN PROSPECTING.USMC.Prospect AS p ON p.PersonId = iper.PersonId INNER JOIN PROSPECTING.USMC.ProspectComment pc ON p.ProspectId = pc.ProspectId INNER JOIN PROSPECTING.USMC.ProspectAc.vityComment pac ON pc.ProspectAc.vityCommentId = pac.ProspectAc.vityCommentId WHERE ie.SchoolId = @SchoolCode AND ie.Gradua.onYear = @SchoolYear AND ie.ImportEventStatusTypeId = 3 AND p.ProspectDisposi.onId = 1 -- Lead AND pac.ProspectCommentTypeId = 3 -- Returned/2nd Semester/Refer to OSO GROUP BY p.ProspectId
SELECT StartDate INTO #ImportEventStartDate FROM #Event UNION SELECT DISTINCT CAST(CONVERT(varchar(4), YEAR(updatedate)) + '-' + CONVERT(varchar(2), MONTH(updatedate)) + '-' + CONVERT(varchar(2), DAY(updatedate)) AS date.me) AS Startdate FROM #ImportEvent
SELECT ProspectId, min(updatedate) as updatedate INTO #ImportEventProspect FROM #ImportEvent group by ProspectId
-- end select from main import events
-- begin select from child import events SELECT UpdateDate, psh.ProspectId INTO #ChildImportEvent FROM PROSPECTING.USMC.ImportEvent AS ie INNER JOIN PROSPECTING.USMC.ImportPerson AS iper ON (iper.ChildImportEventId = ie.ImportEventId) INNER JOIN PROSPECTING.USMC.Person AS per ON per.PersonId = iper.PersonId INNER JOIN PROSPECTING.USMC.Prospect AS p ON p.PersonId = iper.PersonId INNER join PROSPECTING.USMC.ProspectStatusHistory psh ON p.prospec.d=psh.prospec.d AND psh.Disposi.onId IN (2, 3, 4) WHERE ie.SchoolId = @SchoolCode and ie.Gradua.onYear = @SchoolYear AND ie.ImportEventStatusTypeId = 3
INSERT INTO #ChildImportEvent SELECT MIN(pc.ProspectDate) as UpdateDate, p.ProspectId FROM PROSPECTING.USMC.ImportEvent AS ie INNER JOIN PROSPECTING.USMC.ImportPerson AS iper ON (iper.ChildImportEventId = ie.ImportEventId) INNER JOIN PROSPECTING.USMC.Person AS per ON per.PersonId = iper.PersonId INNER JOIN PROSPECTING.USMC.Prospect AS p ON p.PersonId = iper.PersonId INNER JOIN PROSPECTING.USMC.ProspectComment pc ON p.ProspectId = pc.ProspectId INNER JOIN PROSPECTING.USMC.ProspectAc.vityComment pac ON pc.ProspectAc.vityCommentId = pac.ProspectAc.vityCommentId WHERE ie.SchoolId = @SchoolCode and ie.Gradua.onYear = @SchoolYear AND ie.ImportEventStatusTypeId = 3 AND p.ProspectDisposi.onId = 1 -- Lead AND pac.ProspectCommentTypeId = 3 -- Returned/2nd Semester/Refer to OSO GROUP BY p.ProspectId
SELECT StartDate INTO #ChildImportEventStartDate FROM #Event UNION SELECT DISTINCT CAST(CONVERT(varchar(4), YEAR(updatedate)) + '-' + CONVERT(varchar(2), MONTH(updatedate)) + '-' + CONVERT(varchar(2), DAY(updatedate)) AS date.me) AS Startdate FROM #ChildImportEvent
SELECT ProspectId, min(updatedate) as updatedate INTO #ChildImportEventProspect FROM #ChildImportEvent GROUP BY ProspectId -- end select from child import events
INSERT INTO #RESULTS SELECT CAST( CONVERT(varchar(4), YEAR(d.startdate)) + '-' + CONVERT(varchar(2), MONTH(d.startdate)) + '-' + CONVERT(varchar(2), DAY(d.startdate)) AS date.me) AS Date, p.prospec.d FROM #ImportEventStartDate d LEFT OUTER JOIN #ImportEventProspect p ON (CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), d.startdate, 120)) >= ( CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), p.updatedate, 120)) WHERE ProspectId IS NOT NULL GROUP BY d.StartDate, ProspectId
INSERT INTO #RESULTS SELECT CAST( CONVERT(varchar(4), YEAR(d.startdate)) + '-' + CONVERT(varchar(2), MONTH(d.startdate)) + '-' + CONVERT(varchar(2), DAY(d.startdate)) AS date.me) AS Date, p.prospec.d FROM #ChildImportEventStartDate d LEFT OUTER JOIN #ChildImportEventProspect p ON (CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), d.startdate, 120)) >= ( CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), p.updatedate, 120)) WHERE ProspectId IS NOT NULL GROUP BY d.StartDate, ProspectId
SELECT r.date ,COUNT(DISTINCT r.ProspectId) AS cumscrubbed FROM #RESULTS r GROUP BY r.date
DROP TABLE #Event DROP TABLE #ImportEvent DROP TABLE #ImportEventStartDate DROP TABLE #ImportEventProspect DROP TABLE #ChildImportEvent DROP TABLE #ChildImportEventStartDate DROP TABLE #ChildImportEventProspect DROP TABLE #RESULTS
END
